prompts: Create a fighting-type Pokemon with a muscular build and a determined expression.

Generate a Pokemon with a gray color scheme and a fierce fighting stance.
Make a humanoid Pokemon that showcases martial arts moves with its powerful limbs.
Imagine a Pokemon that trains in mountainous areas, honing its fighting skills.
Design a Pokemon with distinct features that represent its fighting abilities and agility.
Show me a bipedal Pokemon that excels in close combat and has a determined personality.

distinctive_features: Fist raised in a combat stance
